oai_dc:dc.dc:title: We have just begun to fight!
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This poster from World War II shows a soldier carrying a rifle in his right hand with his left hand reaching for the sky. On the right is a list of engagements the United States participated in during the course of the war through mid-1943.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: World War I and World War II Poster Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1939-1945; Posters
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law.
